DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective analysis request emergency hormonal contraception use pharmacy protocol register 2003 2006 .
DOC.detailed_description: In 2002 , Levonorgestrel introduce Switzerland emergency hormonal contraception ( EC ) without prescription ( 'pharmacist ' ) . In 2003 , first analysis request EC show dispense EC pharmacy could successfully implement ( Lemke et al 2004 ) . This study repeat three year later aim explore whether user 's profile change introduction low threshold access EC .
